Books I Read In 2021

Dec 25, 2021

Career, Startup & Biography

  • Catalyst: The ultimate strategies on how to win at work and in life - Chandramouli Venkatesan

  • The Minimalist Entrepreneur: How Great Founders Do More with Less - Sahil Lavingia

  • Elon Musk: Tesla, SpaceX, and the Quest for a Fantastic Future - Ashlee Vance

  • Wings of Fire: An Autobiography - A.P.J. Abdul Kalam, Arun Tiwari

  • Faster than Lightning: My Autobiography - Usain Bolt

Data, Cloud & Cryptocurrency

  • Designing Data-Intensive Applications

  • Explain the Cloud Like I’m 10

  • Digital Gold: Bitcoin and the Inside Story of the Misfits and Millionaires Trying to Reinvent Money

  • The Infinite Machine: How an Army of Crypto-hackers Is Building the Next Internet with Ethereum

  • The Internet of Money Volume 1,2,3 - Andreas M. Antonopoulos

Life, Living & Mindset

  • I Hate Running and You Can Too: How to Get Started, Keep Going, and Make Sense of an Irrational Passion - Brendan Leonard

  • The Book of Ichigo Ichie: The Art of Making the Most of Every Moment, the Japanese Way - Hector Garcia Puigcerver

  • Dedicated: The Case for Commitment in an Age of Infinite Browsing - Pete Davis

  • Linchpin: Are You Indispensable? - Seth Godin

  • Skin in the Game: The Hidden Asymmetries in Daily Life - NN Taleb

  • The Black Swan: The Impact of the Highly Improbable - NN Taleb

  • The Courage to Be Happy: Discover the Power of Positive Psychology and Choose Happiness Every Day - Ichiro Kishimi, Fumitake Koga

  • So Good They Can’t Ignore You: Why Skills Trump Passion in the Quest for Work You Love - Cal Newport

  • The Art of the Good Life - Rolf Dobelli

  • Chatter: The Voice in Our Head, Why It Matters, and How to Harness It - Ethan Cross

  • Decisive: How to Make Better Choices in Life and Work - Chip Heath, Dan Heath

  • The Comfort Book - Matt Haig

Personal Finance

  • Let’s Talk Money - Monika Halan

  • The Psychology of Money - Morgan Housel

  • Your Money or Your Life - Vicki Robin, Joe Dominguez

Non-Fiction

  • Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind - Yuval Noah Harari

  • Homo Deus: A History of Tomorrow - Yuval Noah Harari

  • 21 Lessons for the 21st Century - Yuval Noah Harari

  • Humankind: A Hopeful History - Rutger Bregman

  • The Beginning of Infinity: Explanations That Transform the World - David Deutsch

  • The Shallows: What the Internet Is Doing to Our Brains - Nicholas Carr

Fiction

  • The Forty Rules of Love - Elif Shafak

  • The Da Vinci Code - Dan Brown

  • The Wind-Up Bird Chronicle - Haruki Murakami

  • Kafka on the Shore - Haruki Murakami

  • Norwegian Wood - Haruki Murakami

  • After Dark - Haruki Murakami

  • First Person Singular: Stories - Haruki Murakami

  • The Paper Menagerie and Other Stories - Ken Liu

  • Manto: Selected Stories - Saadat Hasan Manto

PS: You can follow me on GoodReads
